attributes.action: Honour the Status Quo 40 Years on
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Honour the Status Quo for services to the music and entertainment industry. Their endless charity work has raised millions over the years for a wide range of charities including the Nordoff Robbins Music Therapy Trust. 

'ROCK 'TIL YOU DROP' raised £2000,000 for children's charities.

QUO appeared at Knebworth charity show which was broadcast to a world-wide TV audience of 200 million people, the event raised over £6 million for the Music Therapy Trust. 

It is estimated that QUO have played over 6000 live shows to a total audience in excess of 25 million people. In doing so, the band has travelled some four million miles and spent 23 years away from home. 

STATUS QUO'S total world-wide record sales exceed 118 million units.

Rock on!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Honour the Status Quo 40 Years on."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14881.asp

Prime Minister's Office
